title.narrative: Integrated Urban Environmental Management in the Tonle Sap Basin Project

description.narrative: The project will finance environmental infrastructure (for flood protection, drainage, wastewater management and treatment, and solid waste management) in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat. The project will finance small-scale community-driven environmental infrastructure; strengthen sector operations and coordination; and build capacity for project management and operations and maintenance.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved urban services and enhanced climate change resilience in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
d. At least 19,600 households served by improved SWM in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat (2013: 1,500 households in Kampong Chhnang; 400 households in Pursat).

description.narrative: Improved urban services and enhanced climate change resilience in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities.

title.narrative: c. Households affected by flooding in Pursat town center reduced by 50% (2013: 2,860 households).

description.narrative: Improved urban services and enhanced climate change resilience in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities.

title.narrative: b. Households affected by floods in Kampong Chhnang reduced by 80% (2013: 5,400 households).

description.narrative: Improved urban services and enhanced climate change resilience in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities.

title.narrative: e. At least 90% sanitation coverage achieved (2013: 50% in Kampong Chhnang and 61% in Pursat).

description.narrative: Improved urban services and enhanced climate change resilience in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities.

title.narrative: a. At least 100,000 residents benefit from the project in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities (2013: 42,500 residents in Kampong Chhnang and 51,400 residents in Pursat).

description.narrative: Improved urban services and enhanced climate change resilience in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities.

title.narrative: f. Strengthened institutional framework and adaptive capacities of USUs in climate resilience infrastructure and climate change and hygiene awareness (baseline: not applicable)

description.narrative: Improved urban services and enhanced climate change resilience in Kampong Chhnang and Pursat municipalities.
